name: Verify Map Terminal Displays System 23 Information
description: Validates that the map terminal displays squad indicators [1] and [0] relative to System 23.
testObjective: Ensure map terminal provides basic navigation information for current destination.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in the ship room

steps.action: Interact with the map terminal (right terminal)

postconditions: Map terminal displays basic navigation data
